sentence: HE TOOK MONEY FROM THE PELOSI CROWD.

verified_claim: Says Democratic North Carolina House candidate Dan McCready "took money from the Pelosi crowd" and is "with them" in their agenda and "wants to repeal your tax cut."
verified_claim_article_title: Is North Carolina's Dan McCready powered by Nancy Pelosi?  PolitiFact North Carolin

sentence: I SUPPORTED VERY MUCH THE MIDDLE CLASS TAX CUTS THAT WERE PART OF THE TAX BILL THAT PASSED LAST YEAR, BUT WE NEEDED TO DO MUCH MORE.

verified_claim: Dan McCready "did admithe opposes middle class tax cuts."

sentence: MR. MCCREADY, THERE IS LIKELY TO BE AN EFFORT IF DEMOCRATS TAKE THE HOUSE THIS FALL TO BEGIN IMPEACHMENT PROCEEDINGS AGAINST THE PRESIDENT.
